DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to estimate the effects of food and of sprinkling ALO-02 pellets on applesauce on the bioavailability of oxycodone and naltrexone/6- beta-naltrexol from an extended release pellets-in-capsule formulation of oxycodone 40 mg with sequestered naltrexone 4.8 mg.
DOC.brief_title: Healthy Volunteers Study to Estimate the Effects of Food on the Bioavailability of Oxycodone and Naltrexone/6- Î’ -Naltrexol From a Extended Release Formulation of Oxycodone With Sequestered Naltrexone
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female subjects between the ages of 18 and 55 years, inclusive Evidence or history of clinically significant diseases
DOC.keyword: management of moderate to severe pain
